title: Do you guys at Riot even sleep?
body: 3 videos in 2 weeks or so, shurima event, azir and now Sion relaunch... What is this madness

replies.body: Sleep is that crazy waste of time that occurs between games of LoL and pooping. At least for nominal folks anyways :-P
Keep in mind, most of that stuff was in production for a long, long, long time.
I know, Im just joking. But you gotta admit it, its been a pretty intense month. And now that end of the season is drawing near, its not going to stop any time soon
The best part of the Championship Finals: Once it ends, it's time for a Preseason, and I love preseasons.
Still, there was A New Dawn and Warriors
Don't let people know that you actually enjoyed these events. You'll get an earful ;P
As I walk through the Valley of Death I shall fear no evil
dude most of them are nerds, you know nerds don' t sleep
I can assure you, the balance team and skins team definitely know what sleep is.  They are very well-rested getting AT LEAST the recommended 8-hours every night in addition to mid-afternoon naps.
